[OneWayRoadDirtRoadIntersectionSolutions]
; transition straight road into straight street
RWSE=0x00020000,0x00000002,0x5700F200,1,0
RNSS=0x02000000,0x00000200,0x5700F200,2,0
RESW=0x00000002,0x00020000,0x5700F200,3,0

;diagonal rhw x diagonal cross network
;

;piece 38

;Tarkus 26Aug2021
;add LHD version
;###RHD###TYPE1=0x03040000,0x02000200,0x57D07000,0,0

;Tarkus 26Aug2021
;add LHD version

;MIS-2 FTL Transition Start
;TYPE1=0x00040304,0x02000200,0x57E21000,0,0
;TYPE2=0x04030400,0x00020002,0x57E21000,1,0

;TYPE4=0x04000403,0x00020002,0x57E21000,3,0

;RealExpressway Road Intersection Solution
;
;Two way Orthogonal
;

;Orthogonal-Starter OWR-2

;

;

;
;Diagonal-Starter
;
